context: Utility company, 2000 employees, planning transition to renewable energy portfolio

request.purpose: Build 200MW solar farm and upgrade grid infrastructure for renewable integration
request.justification: State mandate requires 50% renewable energy by 2030, current portfolio at 15%

decision_process.outcome: Identified optimal 500-acre site with minimal environmental impact
Secured local support and necessary permits, negotiated favorable equipment contracts
Secured $300M in green financing, projected 2% rate increase for customers

expected_outcomes: New revenue from green energy certificates
business_impact.projected_revenue: $150M in green energy premiums over 10 years
